QM_45_AP description: Everyone likes high pen ammo, right? Well this one ain't easy to come by. But I'll tell you what, you prove to me that you can obtain it without my help and that you are proficient with this caliber regardless of the map, enemy you fighting or distance and I'll let you buy it from my stock
QM_45_AP successMessageText: Well now you at least have proper ammo
